featured.text: For an easy and 36 alternative, nutritionists suggest that we pop our own popcorn.

definition.zh_def: 發出爆裂聲或突然出現的動作。
definition.en_def: To make a short, sharp sound or to suddenly appear.
definition.example: The balloon will pop if you poke it with a needle.
